amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds from being used to carry out section 213 of the USA Patriot Act which allows delayed notification of the execution of a search warrant.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds from being available to seek a delay under Section 3103a (b) of title 18 United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Otter amendment Agreed to by recorded vote: 309 - 118 (Roll no. 408).
